QuestData.Title: Lumbering Oafs
QuestData.Description: We are outnumbered by the Alliance. In their fear they send an army to crush a single settlement. But we will not give!$B$BWithout resources, their soldiers will be at a disadvantage. Human peasants busy themselves in the woods outside Marshtide Watch, gathering lumber to rebuild their crumbling walls.$B$BDeny them the wood, and their lives.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you have a complaint about killing peasants, $r, give me a moment to spit in disgust.
QuestData.RewardText: No true member of the Horde should find pleasure in killing such terrified weaklings... without challenge, victory has no true thrill.$B$BBut your dirty work has helped stave off the Alliance and protect our homes here. Be proud of your work for the Horde.
